resources.string:
Instructions:
 
 1: Move the ship using the left and right buttons.
 2: Fire bullets to destroy enemies with the shoot button.
 3: Only one bullet may appear on the screen at a time.
 4: Don't let any enemies pass you!
 5: Danger! Enemies move faster over time.

Development: Peter Goulakos Andrei Ivanov Zhanna Kaufman Mino Thongsavatdy Alex Wong
Mentor: Professor Douglas Densmore Music and Sounds: Introduction Story: Peter Goulakos Background Music: BellTron/Harmonium>>1-6, Harmonium of Hecubus - Created by JimiMod under the Creative Commons 0 License, found at http://www.freesound.org/people/JimiMod/sounds/209974/ Ship Shooting Sound: LAZER SOUND -Created by neirbonad1 under the Attribution Noncommercial License, found at http://www.freesound.org/people/neirbonad1/sounds/178055/
Artwork: Enemy Ship and Home Ship: -Created by Skorpio and Wubitog under CC-BY-SA 3.0 License , found at http://opengameart.org/content/part2artcom-with-skorpios-2nd-kit#comment-form Asteroid: -Created by Jasper under License CC0, found at http://opengameart.org/content/asteroid-generator-and-a-set-of-generated-asteroids Professor Densmore head: http://www.bu.edu/ece/people/faculty/a-g/douglas-densmore/
